page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT,RED LION HOTEL
page.content: The Red Lion is situated at the junction of the Dalton road and the A19. There are few houses in the vicinity and the large car park confirms that most customers have to travel. Dalton Piercy, the nearest village is almost a mile away. The hotel is a large modern clean-looking building. There are a number of bars and a separate night club. In the grounds of the Red Lion there is a pond about 7 metres long and 5 metres wide. On the surrounding lawns there are tables where you can drink out of doors. There are also swings, a see-saw, and a climbing frame with a slide, for the use of customers children.
